A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Going into see this movie I was so excited hoping to find out all the questions that the force awaken set up.  Wow was I disappointed.  This movie is pointless and destroys everything good about Star Wars.  I have no interest or need to see the next one because this movie gave disappointing answer to who Rey's parents were. Also didn't tell us who Snoke was real or where he came from before killing him\, so why does anyone need to see episode IX.  The Last Jedi should be the perfect example why studios need to no star a trilogy without having everything planed out before they start. \nThanks Disney.
